Method Detail

wav2Format

public static IAudioFile wav2Format(WavFile wav,
                                    Format format,
                                    java.io.File targetFile)
                             throws AudioConvertException
This will convert a Format.WAV file into a different format. The original will be deleted and the new one returned with the correct extension.

Parameters:
wav - The wav file to convert
format - The format to convert it to
targetFile - The filename of the file that we are converting to
Returns:
The newly converted wav file
Throws:
AudioConvertException - Thrown if their is a problem converting the file
